Text: Ever heard of Dr. David Duke?  There is an audio book here on thepiratebay called, "Jewish Supremacy" who I believe is also a 100% truth seeker such as William Cooper.  "Behold a Pale Horse" by William Cooper is a book written sacrificing his own life.  This man gave his life for the truth so take it for what it is worth.

William Cooper ridiculed the "It's the Jews" crowd.  In the 2nd half of the show where he predicted 9-11, he tore apart a caller trying to push that line.  

Read Al Haaretz and realize that nearly 1/2 of Israeli Jews despise the atrocities committed by their government.  A higher percentage Israeli Jews are awake than American under the Dem/Rep monopoly of thought - both of which tow the Elite's party line as exemplified in the Jerusalem Post / NYTimes / WashPost, etc.

This film is awesome - not perfect in their solution, but very good info and analysis.  If anyone else has seen a better solution-set presented, please advise.

Are you sure you don't have Alex Jones confused with William Cooper?  "He ridiculed the it's the jews crowd," I guess that explains why there is an entire chapter titled, "Protocols of the Elders of Zion," 34 pages long, huh?
